__TOC__

The Ubuntu Korean LoCo Team has been a very active, fast growing group of people that supports and spreads Ubuntu amongst the Korean speaking community widely. We provide the most valuable, vital information, and share knowledges on Ubuntu in the Korean language.

The Ubuntu Korean LoCo Team has composed of many people with diverse backgrounds and focusing on promoting the use of Ubuntu Linux and the free software philosophy in general. The team is shaping a set of projects that will be assigned to individual workgroups in the near future.

=== Key Details ===

* '''Date''' - (''Mon Mar 10 2014'')
* '''Team Contact''' - Seowon Jung <jswlinux@gmail.com>
* '''Membership''' - 19,779 registered users to our <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu.or.kr|website]]</nowiki> and 155 Active members on <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ko/+members#active|launchpad]]</nowiki>.
* '''Launchpad Team''' - https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-ko
* '''Mailing List''' - https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-ko/
* '''IRC''' - #ubuntu-ko on freenode

=== Roadmap ===

* Continue providing support as a community.
* Continue maintaining good discussions on IRC and <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/groups/ubuntu.ko|facebook page]]</nowiki> 
* March Meeting: Will be held on March 29, 2014 (<nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/events/257109367802391/?source=3&source_newsfeed_story_type=regular|Meeting page]]</nowiki>)
* Launch party - Have a Ubuntu 14.04 launch party / ceremony.
* Distribution - Distribute ubuntu live media through offline meetings.
* Website - Currently website renewal is in process.  It will be done by May 2014
* Attract more active members.
